p: The full source code is openly available at https://github.com/broadinstitute/ebola-imc-public. Refer to IMC's Ebola Response page ( https://internationalmedicalcorps.org/ebola-response), for instructions on how external researchers can access the data. The app is freely available on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.broadinstitute.ebola_care_guidelines.
